scripts.build: npm run build@2.0 && npm run build@3.0
scripts.build@2.0: (export HUGO_VERSION=0.31.1 NODE_ENV=production; webpack --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js && node_modules/hugo-bin/vendor/hugo version && node_modules/hugo-bin/vendor/hugo --baseURL=/docs -d ../dist/docs -s site)
scripts.build@3.0: (export HUGO_VERSION=0.31.1 NODE_ENV=production; webpack --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js && node_modules/hugo-bin/vendor/hugo version && node_modules/hugo-bin/vendor/hugo --baseURL=/beta-docs --contentDir=content@beta -d ../dist/beta-docs -s site)
